Comment 3: 
Calling make() with a slice type allocates an underlying array, using a slice expresson
x[i:j] reuses the underlying array of x, and append(x, e) may re-use the underlying
array of x or allocate a new one and copy x into it.

I agree the spec could be a bit more direct about it. I'll leave this open as a reminder.
_Status changed to **Accepted**._
